msbt.message: Before I went to sleep last night, I made a checklist to prepare for today's big Fishing Tourney. Step one: find and talk to C.J. Step two: catch lots of fishies. Step three: humbly accept prize. Unfortunately, I couldn't make myself believe that I was going to make it past step one.

There must be some trick to reeling in fish that I just can't puzzle out.I've read every fishing book that I could find, taken lots of notes, and studied all the advice I could But every time I see a shadow in the water offshore, I just can't convince myself that I'll be able to reel it in.
When I saw C.J. out there, it made it all realâ€”the Fishing Tourney is really happening, ! I've been waiting all week for this, and it's finally here!
It's so rare that I can manage to reel in any huge fish I spot offshoreI get so frustrated sometimes, but I try to tell myself I can learn to fish as well as you, with practice.
Taking a little break from fishing? I guess I am too. I've read that it's good to try and pace yourself.Trying to catch a lot of fish within a time limit can be really stressful.
